<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.scoped.api" name="Service Catalog Scoped API" state="published" version="1.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow" namespace="sn_sc" licensable="true"> <description>Service Catalog Scoped API to support application creation on Service Catalog platform</description>
<requires> <import plugin="com.glideapp.servicecatalog"/> </requires>
<!-- Java classes scriptable API --> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CatalogJS" class="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.scoped.api.CatalogJS"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CatItem" class="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.scoped.api.CatalogItemJS" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CatCategory" class="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.scoped.api.CategoryJS" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CatalogItemVariable" class="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.scoped.api.CatalogItemVariableJS" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CatalogItemVariableSet" class="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.scoped.api.CatalogItemVariableSetJS" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CatalogItemVariableSetM2M" class="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.scoped.api.CatalogItemVariableSetM2MJS" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CatalogSearchJS" class="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.scoped.api.CatalogSearchJS"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CartJS" class="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.scoped.api.CartJS"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="OrderGuide" class="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.scoped.api.OrderGuideJS"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="CatalogClientScript" class="com.glideapp.servicecatalog.scoped.api.CatalogClientScriptJS"/> </plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Service Catalog Scoped API to support application creation on Service Catalog platform</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.glideapp.servicecatalog.scoped.api</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Service Catalog Scoped API</name> <path>plugin://com.glideapp.servicecatalog.scoped.api/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glideapp.servicecatalog</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>ideapp.servicecatalog.scoped.api</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin>
